医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
通过饮用水污染暴露的PFA可能在儿童期癌症风险中发挥作用由加利福尼亚大学乔·旺·温（Joe C. Wen）人口与公共卫生学院领导的一项研究揭示了饮用水中接触人类和多氟烷基物质的联系与某些童年癌症的风险增加之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/pfas-exposure-via-via-drinking-water-water-contamination-may-play-play-a----- role-in-Childhood-canccancer-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/pfas-exposure-via-drinking-water-water-contamination-may-play-play-play-a-cand-candhood-cancer-cancer-cancer-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=943225CA-93FE-4102-9D75-70154D3EFB00 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 15:50:48 -0500 PFAS exposure via drinking water contamination may play a role in childhood cancer risk
淀粉可能会影响您的口腔健康 - 对您的DNA养育康奈尔研究人员发现，淀粉消化基因，改变口腔细菌的遗传变异，影响潜在的牙齿健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/starch-might-impt-impact-your-oral-healthe28094-depeperding-on-on-your-dna.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/starch-might-impt-impact-your-oral-healthe28094Depeping-on-on-your-dna.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B431B768-F4EB-468D-A359-5E6186118841 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 15:47:00 -0500 Starch might impact your oral health—depending on your DNA
试点研究探讨了阿尔茨海默氏症预防中塞溶剂的潜力一项称为耐力的新试验研究（减轻衰老中的鼻溶剂和神经系统障碍），该研究的重点是鼻溶剂药物，达替尼和槲皮素（DQ）的影响，消除了体内的旧（衰老）细胞，从而使间歇性治疗可能会在老年人的认知能力中有望改善老年人的认知能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/pilot-study-explores-potential-potential-of-senolytics-in-alzheimers-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/pilot-study-explores-potential-potential-potential-of-senolytics-in-alzheimers-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fc74508-72EF-4EBD-B23B-D14A299FC100 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 15:46:11 -0500 Pilot study explores potential of senolytics in Alzheimer's prevention
新研究发现大脑如何创建空间图大脑会创建内部“地图”，以帮助我们从周围的环境中导航和学习，但是这些地图如何仍然是一个理解的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/new-study-uncovers-how-the-the-brain-creates-spatial-maps.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/new-study-uncovers-how-the-the-brain-creates-spatial-maps.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=550AA889-F278-4ACA-8852-DCC2B4F2459D Wed, 26 Feb 2025 15:39:33 -0500 New study uncovers how the brain creates spatial maps
抗狭窄药物可能会削弱脑癌患者的免疫系统由脑癌引起的肿胀是一个严重的问题，可能导致严重的副作用甚至死亡。虽然控制肿胀很重要，但一项新研究表明，剂量后几周内通常处方的抗固定药物会抑制免疫系统，从而抑制人体对抗癌症的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/anti-selling-drug-may-weaken-may-mamune-mmune-system-in-system-in-brain-cancer-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/anti-swelling-drug-may-weaken-weaken-immune-system-in-system-in-brain-cancer-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49c8ae63-762f-40A7-A29E-BEB75A209EB8 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 15:28:52 -0500 Anti-swelling drug may weaken immune system in brain cancer patients
空气采样检测到70-90％的家禽病毒，并揭示了50个隐藏威胁研究人员发现，活质市场中的环境采样可检测到70-90％的家禽病毒，通常超过传统的拭子方法，并确定了50种其他病毒，其中一些病毒来自非阿比亚的来源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/air-sampling-detects-70e2809393939025-of-poultry-viruses-viruess-and-reveals-reveals-50-50-50-more-rored-More-Hidden-Hidden-Hidden-Hidder-Threateats.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/air-sampling-detects-70e280939025-firtry-viruess-viruess-viruess-and-reveals-50-50-50-more-reare-rore-rored-more-hidden-hidden-hidden-hidden-hiddle-threats.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d61d16d4-bebb-40A5-A45A-A45A-2A640BA89D0A Wed, 26 Feb 2025 15:17:00 -0500 Air sampling detects 70–90% of poultry viruses and reveals 50 more hidden threats
稳定基因的发现提供了对衰老和寿命的见解一份新的研究论文于2025年1月27日在《衰老》（老化）中发表，第17卷，第1期，标题为“年龄不变基因：鼠参考基因的多组织鉴定和表征”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/discovery-of-stable-genes-offers-ingights-into-into-Into-Into-Aging-anging-ang-longevity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/discovery-of-stable-genes-offers-ingights-into-into-Into-Into-Into-Aging-ang-longevity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cb474eb-73EF-444F-8390-7C4C4C6531D1B6 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 13:03:34 -0500 Discovery of stable genes offers insights into aging and longevity
研究人员的目的是通过最先进的医疗技术检测食管预科剂Case Western Reserve University（CWRU）和大学医院（UH）的研究人员将使用他们发明的最先进的医疗技术，并获得了向Lucid Diagnostics Inc.的许可，以检测食管前药物，特别是Barrett的食管（BE）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/researchers-aim-to-detect-epophageal-proceal-proceal-with-state-state of-the-art-Art-Medical-Medical-technologies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/researchers-aim-to-detect-esophageal-proceal-proceal-with-state-state-state of-the-Art-Medical-Medical-Medical-technologies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A2659D9A-9B63-4B0C-9C19-9C19-3320ED0E8489 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 12:59:41 -0500 Researchers aim to detect esophageal precancer with state-of-the-art medical technologies
视网膜变化可能是阿尔茨海默氏病的早期指标印第安纳大学医学院的一组科学家已经确定，眼睛背面的光感应组织影响视网膜，可以作为阿尔茨海默氏病的早期指标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/retinal-changes-may-serve-serve-serve-as----- indicator-indicator-for-alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/retinal-changes-may-serve-serve-serve-as-servel-indicator-indicator-for-alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16CD3AFB-379C-4F9A-962D-C34795D04C17 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 12:42:23 -0500 Retinal changes may serve as early indicator for Alzheimer's disease
与亚洲印度家庭发现的2型糖尿病相关的稀有基因变体一项发表在传播医学上的一项新研究，即自然出版物，详细介绍了稀有基因变种的发现，这些变异剂增加了亚洲印度人多代人中2型糖尿病的患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/rare-gene-variants-linked-to-ty-type-type-2-diabetes-diavesed-in-in-Asian-Asian-Indian-Families.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/rare-gene-variants-linked-to-to-ty-type-type-2-diabetes-diabetes-risfecovered in-Asian-Indian-Indian-Families.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0da9fdfdf-f017-440d-b729-3337964918a2 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 12:35:24 -0500 Rare gene variants linked to Type 2 diabetes discovered in Asian Indian families
